articles.title: Pacquiao-Spence fight in August faces hurdle - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: THE August fight between boxing legend Manny Pacquiao and American champion Errol Spence, Jr. was thrown a roadblock in the lead-up after a lawsuit was filed against the Filipino fighter in the United States.
